metadata.name: Blockchain Bandit #0002
metadata.description:
The Blockchain Bandits are a collection of 3,333 ERC-721 NFTs living in the Ethereum blockchain. The team is comprised of doxxed startup founders, devs, & artists united under one goal - to create a long-standing brand that incorporates several aspects of P2E gaming and DeFi to give utility to our initial genesis collection.

Website: https://www.blockchainbanditsnft.com/
